articles.contents:
Abdul M Khan
          
          
          Home
          About

          Abdul M Khan
          
            
                
                  
                    Google Scholar

                    Email
                  
                
              
                          
        

        
          
      
      
        
          I am Abdul Mahidud Khan, Currently working in Bangladesh University of Professionals as a lecturer of economics.I have completed my bachelors and masters from Jahangirnagar University, Bangladesh. I am in academia for more than four years after completion of my masters. I was research fellow at the Friedrich Ebert Stiftung for their program Economies of Tomorrow and then I joined at Bangladesh University of Professionals. I have conducted several research projects of my own and involved in various other projects where I had different responsibilities. Also, I wrote few research papers too. I am proficient in R, Stata, ODK, and LaTeX.
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Abdul M Khan

articles.description: Hey There. You found my personal website. You can find what I have been up to lately. Also, you can learn more about me. I hope you enjoy it!
